text:
Hi all! I am new here. I just started with HubSpot CMS for Developers cert and I am unsure about my setup. When I run `npm install -g @HubSpot/cli` nothing showed up in my project folder in VS Code. I found some help in HubSpot forum and run:

```1 npm init
 
2 npm install @HubSpot/cli
 
3 npx hs init```
And only then I got `package.json` in my folder, and after confirming my account key I got the `HubSpot.config.yml` file.
It looks different than the setup Jeff had in the video, where there was `package-lock.json` file and the `node-modules` folder.
Can someone please confirm that my setup is correct?
I don’t know why node-modules folder didn’t show up here. I was able to install the test theme through this command  `npx @HubSpot/create-cms-project test-theme` so it looks like everything is fine, but I’d rather double-check.
